casebody.data:
Anthony CASTRONOVA, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
COUNTY OF BERGEN, Defendant,
and
Bergen County Prosecutor's Office (BCPO) State of New Jersey and Bergen County Prosecutor John Molinelli, Defendants-Respondents. C-209 Sept. Term 2017
079691 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 20, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000933-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
